content:
The total fighting loss of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 28.03.24 are approximately:

  • personnel - -439 970 (+780) persons liquidated
  • tanks -6914 (+10)
  • combat armored vehicles -13237 (+21)
  • Artillery systems -10963 (+32)
  • RSZV -1021 (+2)
  • air defense means -729 (+1)
  • aircraft -347 (0)
  • Helicopters -325 (0)
  • UAV of the operative-tactical level-8600 (+22)
  • Winged rockets -2017 (+2)
  • ships / boats -26 (0)
  • submarines -1 (0)
  • Automobile equipment and tanks -14595 (+56)
  • Special technique -1800 (+6)

The data is specified ...

Beat the occupier! Let's win together! Our strength is in truth!

Source:The General Staff of the Armed Forces of UkraineAs of 28.03.24.
title: The number of liquidated invaders approaches 440 thousand - the General Staff of the Armed Forces
author: Army Inform
